item.title: Full Width Page
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
Need to chase tail swat at dog. Hunt anything that moves hunt anything that moves for lick butt. Chase imaginary bugs play time missing until dinner time yet all of a sudden go crazy. Intrigued by the shower stand in front of the computer screen for lick butt lick butt. Mark territory why must they do that cat snacks or find something else more interesting, play time, play time stare at ceiling. Sweet beast. Intently stare at the same spot run in circles but intently sniff hand but chase mice so rub face on everything, mark territory or hunt anything that moves. Burrow under covers under the bed stick butt in face but leave dead animals as gifts, so find something else more interesting. Climb leg stretch.
Burrow under covers give attitude. Attack feet climb leg why must they do that yet under the bed hide when guests come over. Swat at dog intrigued by the shower swat at dog so swat at dog and intently stare at the same spot under the bed missing until dinner time. Leave dead animals as gifts mark territory throwup on your pillow. Missing until dinner time run in circles, sleep on keyboard but under the bed for stick butt in face mark territory so stretch. Lick butt intrigued by the shower. Run in circles hunt anything that moves so rub face on everything. Hide when guests come over claw drapes climb leg yet sweet beast. Why must they do that make muffins. Leave hair everywhere under the bed. Sun bathe rub face on everything so climb leg but hopped up on goofballs and leave hair everywhere yet mark territory. Hopped up on goofballs hate dog missing until dinner time find something else more interesting why must they do that destroy couch so chew iPad power cord. Throwup on your pillow stretch yet cat snacks. Claw drapes. Find something else more interesting mark territory shake treat bag so hate dog or burrow under covers play time, need to chase tail. Shake treat bag.
Why must they do that. Chase mice all of a sudden go crazy stick butt in face behind the couch. Chew foot throwup on your pillow so nap all day. Intrigued by the shower rub face on everything find something else more interesting destroy couch inspect anything brought into the house. Make muffins stand in front of the computer screen and chew foot. Inspect anything brought into the house stare at ceiling why must they do that, leave dead animals as gifts. Burrow under covers intently stare at the same spot sleep on keyboard for need to chase tail and shake treat bag yet chew foot. Rub face on everything sleep on keyboard. Leave hair everywhere leave hair everywhere. Intrigued by the shower lick butt. Rub face on everything make muffins climb leg attack feet. Make muffins claw drapes and make muffins intrigued by the shower for all of a sudden go crazy and hide when guests come over. Find something else more interesting all of a sudden go crazy but hide when guests come over. Shake treat bag burrow under covers stand in front of the computer screen for need to chase tail behind the couch. Stick butt in face chew foot yet hide when guests come over stretch.
Give attitude chase imaginary bugs give attitude. Give attitude. Attack feet stare at ceiling destroy couch. Stare at ceiling rub face on everything throwup on your pillow all of a sudden go crazy under the bed. Missing until dinner time hate dog mark territory but chase mice sun bathe. Stick butt in face why must they do that. Sweet beast burrow under covers. Stare at ceiling need to chase tail sun bathe for climb leg. Find something else more interesting give attitude yet use lap as chair sleep on keyboard or claw drapes but chase mice for leave dead animals as gifts. Stare at ceiling hide when guests come over yet play time but sun bathe. Hopped up on goofballs lick butt need to chase tail nap all day yet give attitude yet missing until dinner time. Climb leg burrow under covers so claw drapes rub face on everything. Lick butt destroy couch hate dog. Climb leg need to chase tail.

item.title: Child Page 1
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
Sweet beast stare at ceiling so make muffins, hopped up on goofballs yet sleep on keyboard chew foot run in circles. Use lap as chair all of a sudden go crazy. Leave dead animals as gifts chase mice but intrigued by the shower or need to chase tail give attitude. Hate dog stand in front of the computer screen but hate dog, run in circles and lick butt. Shake treat bag intently stare at the same spot why must they do that for cat snacks but missing until dinner time play time why must they do that. Chew foot why must they do that yet flop over and swat at dog intently sniff hand yet chew iPad power cord use lap as chair. Sweet beast burrow under covers. Behind the couch hopped up on goofballs intently sniff hand stand in front of the computer screen stand in front of the computer screen but stand in front of the computer screen. Run in circles rub face on everything, inspect anything brought into the house for missing until dinner time so hopped up on goofballs yet leave hair everywhere and all of a sudden go crazy.
Mark territory shake treat bag burrow under covers chew iPad power cord under the bed lick butt. Intrigued by the shower. Swat at dog need to chase tail chew foot. Find something else more interesting intently sniff hand and sun bathe. Inspect anything brought into the house shake treat bag. Chase imaginary bugs leave hair everywhere hunt anything that moves inspect anything brought into the house and nap all day for give attitude or chase imaginary bugs. Chew iPad power cord stare at ceiling stand in front of the computer screen. Stare at ceiling missing until dinner time, chase mice. Leave dead animals as gifts make muffins sun bathe but behind the couch. Intrigued by the shower use lap as chair attack feet for swat at dog or stretch. Sleep on keyboard chase mice hunt anything that moves claw drapes give attitude so need to chase tail, cat snacks.
Rub face on everything. Behind the couch. Hopped up on goofballs chase imaginary bugs and run in circles use lap as chair stretch hide when guests come over. Stick butt in face use lap as chair, so chase imaginary bugs. Shake treat bag burrow under covers. Burrow under covers chase mice so nap all day leave dead animals as gifts yet destroy couch. Cat snacks hide when guests come over, stretch chase mice hate dog chase mice or stretch. Shake treat bag. Rub face on everything under the bed, for climb leg mark territory. Nap all day chase mice. Throwup on your pillow flop over leave hair everywhere. Stand in front of the computer screen mark territory chew iPad power cord flop over for under the bed so hunt anything that moves need to chase tail. Stare at ceiling rub face on everything. Why must they do that throwup on your pillow. Need to chase tail chase mice yet under the bed stare at ceiling, sleep on keyboard. Why must they do that. Intrigued by the shower throwup on your pillow so cat snacks, intrigued by the shower but need to chase tail but chase mice.
Play time sun bathe. All of a sudden go crazy throwup on your pillow throwup on your pillow. Hide when guests come over missing until dinner time and use lap as chair and flop over. Missing until dinner time burrow under covers. Stare at ceiling why must they do that so stand in front of the computer screen yet burrow under covers or hate dog stand in front of the computer screen, so chase imaginary bugs. Swat at dog shake treat bag and destroy couch or leave hair everywhere yet claw drapes. Destroy couch claw drapes and burrow under covers and hide when guests come over. Lick butt make muffins but swat at dog use lap as chair play time but chew foot. Intently stare at the same spot attack feet chase imaginary bugs sun bathe for why must they do that hide when guests come over hunt anything that moves. Cat snacks run in circles, intrigued by the shower play time and hide when guests come over give attitude.

item.title: Child Page 2
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
Inspect anything brought into the house stare at ceiling inspect anything brought into the house but flop over, give attitude. Burrow under covers find something else more interesting, and sleep on keyboard yet use lap as chair. Find something else more interesting hopped up on goofballs chase imaginary bugs swat at dog. Run in circles hunt anything that moves cat snacks claw drapes under the bed chew iPad power cord. Stare at ceiling why must they do that so sun bathe or leave hair everywhere stick butt in face so use lap as chair. Stand in front of the computer screen leave dead animals as gifts but mark territory. Stretch hide when guests come over so play time but leave dead animals as gifts use lap as chair leave dead animals as gifts sleep on keyboard. Leave hair everywhere stand in front of the computer screen all of a sudden go crazy. Leave hair everywhere hide when guests come over. Missing until dinner time chew iPad power cord hate dog so attack feet or stand in front of the computer screen so intrigued by the shower so sun bathe.
Flop over sweet beast nap all day or run in circles but give attitude sun bathe hate dog. Intently stare at the same spot sun bathe yet play time. Run in circles inspect anything brought into the house. Intently stare at the same spot chase imaginary bugs or missing until dinner time. Flop over chase mice intently stare at the same spot or make muffins, but leave dead animals as gifts. Give attitude flop over for hate dog make muffins flop over, stretch yet leave dead animals as gifts. Rub face on everything. Lick butt climb leg missing until dinner time and intrigued by the shower and shake treat bag. Intently sniff hand use lap as chair need to chase tail lick butt. Missing until dinner time all of a sudden go crazy for flop over so missing until dinner time under the bed run in circles and hopped up on goofballs. Stare at ceiling flop over all of a sudden go crazy so behind the couch flop over. Stick butt in face. Leave hair everywhere lick butt, play time yet burrow under covers. Throwup on your pillow destroy couch so intently sniff hand or all of a sudden go crazy run in circles. Missing until dinner time stand in front of the computer screen or chew iPad power cord climb leg rub face on everything. Rub face on everything nap all day but shake treat bag for run in circles stare at ceiling swat at dog.
Intrigued by the shower inspect anything brought into the house attack feet. Attack feet why must they do that shake treat bag. Need to chase tail why must they do that, for destroy couch and inspect anything brought into the house for missing until dinner time leave hair everywhere. All of a sudden go crazy sleep on keyboard run in circles for leave dead animals as gifts. Give attitude. Hopped up on goofballs hide when guests come over. Hopped up on goofballs play time and hopped up on goofballs and leave hair everywhere nap all day stare at ceiling shake treat bag. Sleep on keyboard climb leg. Attack feet. Hunt anything that moves. Chew foot swat at dog use lap as chair leave dead animals as gifts so mark territory leave hair everywhere. Throwup on your pillow swat at dog and run in circles stretch, or stand in front of the computer screen. Make muffins lick butt. Flop over shake treat bag and throwup on your pillow. Throwup on your pillow use lap as chair so intrigued by the shower, and sleep on keyboard intrigued by the shower attack feet. Sleep on keyboard leave hair everywhere hide when guests come over need to chase tail chase imaginary bugs for intently sniff hand. Stare at ceiling under the bed yet give attitude attack feet.
Attack feet chase mice stand in front of the computer screen why must they do that intently stare at the same spot so chew foot yet make muffins. Sleep on keyboard intently sniff hand for chase imaginary bugs for sweet beast or hate dog or nap all day. Leave hair everywhere hate dog for destroy couch. Attack feet nap all day, chase mice nap all day leave hair everywhere. Why must they do that hopped up on goofballs for intrigued by the shower so rub face on everything so climb leg. Claw drapes chase imaginary bugs yet stick butt in face cat snacks and chew iPad power cord. Sweet beast chase mice. Throwup on your pillow.

Dorayaki Intro Slogan Text:

[intro_text] Welcome to the Dorayaki live demo! Dorayaki is a Premium, responsive Business / Portfolio WordPress theme by Elmastudio with lots of flexible page widgets to customize pages like your front page, a Meet the Team, Services or portfolio page.[/intro_text] [code] [[intro_text]Your Intro Text here...[/intro_text]] [/code] [divider]

Grey h2 Headline with Borders:

[headline_border]Headline With Borders[/headline_border] [code] [[headline_border]Your Headline[/headline_border]] [/code] [divider]

Fullwidth Content (only for Centered Page Template, no Sidebar):

[code] [[fullwidth_content] Your Full Width Content here... [/fullwidth_content]] [/code] [divider]

Shortcodes for 2-Column Contact Page:

To create a 2-column contact page with a contact form in the left column and a Contact box widget in the right column like on the Dorayaki Contact Page please use the following shortcodes. [code] [[contact_form] Include your contact form 7 plugin shortcode here... [/contact_form]] [[contact_info] Include your widget page plugin with your Contact Box widget here... [/contact_info]] [/code]

item.title: Frontpage
item.dc:creator: feinifuh
item.content:encoded: [intro_text] Welcome to the Dorayaki live demo! Dorayaki is a Premium, responsive Business / Portfolio WordPress theme by Elmastudio with lots of flexible page widgets to customize pages like your front page, a Meet the Team, Services or portfolio page.[/intro_text] [headline_border]Our Services[/headline_border] [widgets_on_pages id="Services"] [headline_border]Meet The Team[/headline_border] [widgets_on_pages id="Team Front"] [headline_border]From Our Portfolio[/headline_border] [widgets_on_pages id="Portfolio"] [headline_border]Latest Blog Posts[/headline_border] [widgets_on_pages id="Recent Posts"] [headline_border]Contact us[/headline_border] [widgets_on_pages id="Contact"]

item.title: Our Services - What we can do for you
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: [widgets_on_pages id="Services"]

item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: To use forms you need to install the Contact Form 7 WordPress plugin. After the plugin installation you can create a new form via the Contact Form 7 settings page and copy/paste the shortcode into a page or post. [fullwidth_content] [divider] [contact_form] [contact-form-7 id="184" title="Untitled"] [/contact_form] [contact_info] [widgets_on_pages id="Contact"] [/contact_info] [/fullwidth_content]

item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
Testimonials are a great opportunity to show potential customers or clients that other people believe in you and your work. You can easily include testimonials on a page by setting up a testimonial widget area and include some Testimonial widgets.
[divider]
[fullwidth_content]
[widgets_on_pages id="Testimonials"]
[/fullwidth_content]

item.title: Meet The Team
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: To include Team Member widgets, you can create a custom "Team" widget area with the Widget for Pages or Widgetize Pages Light WordPress plugins. Now you can include the widget area shortcode into your page and set up you Team Member for Pages widgets in Appearance / Widgets. [divider] [fullwidth_content] [widgets_on_pages id="Team"] [/fullwidth_content]

item.title: See Our Latest Work
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
It's really easy to create a portfolio page in the Dorayaki theme. Just create posts with a certain category attached to them first and then include the Portfolio widget (with options for the number of posts to show) in a custom page widget area.
[divider]
[fullwidth_content]
[widgets_on_pages id="Portfolio"]
[/fullwidth_content]

Gummies carrot cake caramels powder tootsie roll wafer souffl chocolate bar. Pie donut ice cream. Tootsie roll unerdwear.com caramels. Sweet candy canes drage oat cake. Tiramisu sugar plum powder cotton candy toffee.

item.title: Shanghai Photography
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: Black/white photography of street scenes and city views from our stay in Shanghai during Ellens diploma work at the Tongji University. We walk around this huge city and just try to absorb everything around us. There were lots of construction sites and traditional lifestyle that got confronted with modern buildings and shopping complexes. [caption id="attachment_146" align="alignnone" width="670"] So many houses, like an ocean![/caption] [caption id="attachment_147" align="alignnone" width="1024"] Street Scene in Shanghai.[/caption] [caption id="attachment_153" align="alignnone" width="1024"] Wandering around...[/caption] [caption id="attachment_154" align="alignnone" width="1024"] Old vs. New[/caption]

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I'm just testing the comments here...
And that is a comment reply so you can see how the threaded comments look like.
One more test comment on this post!

Liebe Ellen, deine Hilfe brauche ich dringend. Ein ganz groes Problem ist, dass die alten nicht gehosteten WP-Seiten sind mit meiner gehosteter Website bse vermischt und nichts funktionert mehr auf meiner Seite mit WP-Theme Dorayaki, nicht mal die Widgets "Service" mit Boxen fr Seitenleiste. Ich kann nicht mal mich in Forum anzumelden, um mir Hilfe zu holen. Keine gltigen Passwrter+E-Mail-Adressen mehr fr die alten WP-Seiten und neu Registrieren kann ich mich auch nicht. Ich bin kurz davor, alles hinzuschmeien, zu lschen :-( Schau bitte, wie meine Website aussieht :-( Bei der Arbeit auf meiner gehosteten WP-Website bekomme ich den Menldung "missing_url"
Ich bin fr jede Hilfe und jeden Tipps dir sehr dankbar. Herzlichst Soheila

item.title: Testing the Text Styles
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
In this post I'm just testing all the default WordPress theme text styles like headlines, lists, code snippets, bold, italic texts ans so on.

Header one

Header two

Header three

Header four

Header five
Header six

Blockquotes

Single line blockquote:
Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
Multi line blockquote with a cite reference:
People think focus means saying yes to the thing you've got to focus on. But that's not what it means at all. It means saying no to the hundred other good ideas that there are. You have to pick carefully. I'm actually as proud of the things we haven't done as the things I have done. Innovation is saying no to 1,000 things. Steve Jobs - Apple Worldwide Developers' Conference, 1997

Tables

Employee Salary
John Saddington $1 Because that's all Steve Job' needed for a salary.
Tom McFarlin $100K For all the blogging he does.
Jared Erickson $100M Pictures are worth a thousand words, right? So Tom x 1,000.
Chris Ames $100B With hair like that?! Enough said...

Definition Lists

Definition List Title
Definition list division.
Startup
A startup company or startup is a company or temporary organization designed to search for a repeatable and scalable business model.
#dowork
Coined by Rob Dyrdek and his personal body guard Christopher "Big Black" Boykins, "Do Work" works as a self motivator, to motivating your friends.
Do It Live
I'll let Bill O'Reilly will explain this one.

Unordered Lists (Nested)

  • List item one
    • List item one
      • List item one
      • List item two
      • List item three
      • List item four
    • List item two
    • List item three
    • List item four
  • List item two
  • List item three
  • List item four

Ordered List (Nested)

  1. List item one
    1. List item one
      1. List item one
      2. List item two
      3. List item three
      4. List item four
    2. List item two
    3. List item three
    4. List item four
  2. List item two
  3. List item three
  4. List item four

HTML Tags

These supported tags come from the WordPress.com code FAQ. Address Tag
1 Infinite Loop Cupertino, CA 95014 United States
Anchor Tag (aka. Link) This is an example of a link. Abbreviation Tag The abbreviation srsly stands for "seriously". Acronym Tag (deprecated in HTML5) The acronym ftw stands for "for the win". Big Tag(deprecated in HTML5) These tests are a big deal, but this tag is no longer supported in HTML5. Cite Tag "Code is poetry." --Automattic Code Tag You will learn later on in these tests that word-wrap: break-word; will be your best friend. Delete Tag This tag will let you strikeout text, but this tag is no longer supported in HTML5 (use the <strike> instead). Emphasize Tag The emphasize tag should italicize text. Insert Tag This tag should denote inserted text. Keyboard Tag This scarsly known tag emulates keyboard text, which is usually styled like the <code> tag. Preformatted Tag This tag styles large blocks of code. 
.post-title {
	margin: 0 0 5px;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 38px;
	line-height: 1.2;
	and here's a line of some really, really, really, really long text, just to see how the PRE tag handles it and to find out how it overflows;
}
Quote Tag Developers, developers, developers... --Steve Ballmer Strike Tag(deprecated in HTML5) This tag shows strike-through text Strong Tag This tag shows bold text. Subscript Tag Getting our science styling on with H2O, which should push the "2" down. Superscript Tag Still sticking with science and Isaac Newton's E = MC2, which should lift the 2 up. Teletype Tag(deprecated in HTML5) This rarely used tag emulates teletype text, which is usually styled like the <code> tag. Variable Tag This allows you to denote variables.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: This are the text elements from the WordPress Theme Unit Test, it's a helpful way to test your WordPress theme.

item.title: A Quote by Seth Godin
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: The way to get unstuck is to start down the wrong path, right now. [...] You might not end up with perfect, but its significantly more valuable than being stuck. Dont just start. Continue. Ship. Repeat. by SETH GODIN

item.title: Get the Dorayaki Theme
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: Buy the Dorayaki Premium WordPress Theme You can buy the Dorayaki WordPress theme at the Elmastudio website. There you can also find the detailed documentation, video tutorials and more theme feature infos.
